title: CS Competency Enhancement: Collaborative Improvement of Blended Learning Environments in Creative Arts

learning_goals: Learners can design three navigation strategies to optimize an LMS interface for creative arts education purposes.
Participants can propose two or more improvements for the aesthetic elements of existing VLE content by applying a reflective practice process.
